price: "Kuma dã sun tsayu* sõsai a kan hanya, dã lalle Mun shãyar da su ruwa mai yawa."
arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا
footnotes: * Tsayuwa sosai wato su bautawa Allah kamar yadda Allah Ya umarce su, su yi Masa ɗa'a saboda Yã wadãta su.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-allawi is'taqāmū ʿalā al-ṭarīqati la-asqaynāhum māan ghadaqan
translations: surely We (would) have given them to drink
